mapper.select: select * from zt_workhistory t where t.createDate between current_date()-7 and sysdate() and id in (#{ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from zt_workhistory t where t.createDate between current_date()-7 and sysdate()
select * from zt_workhistory t where t.createdate >= #{date} and t.createdate < #{yesDate}
delete from zt_workhistory t where t.`name` = #{name} and t.createDate >= #{date} and createdate < #{endTime}
